8 #include <rktl_perception/localizer.h>

10 namespace rktl_perception {
11 
12 Localizer::Localizer(const ros::NodeHandle& nh, const ros::NodeHandle& pnh) : _nh(nh), _pnh(pnh) {
13  std::string detectionTopic;
14  std::string pubTopic;
15  std::map<std::string, std::string> pubTopics;
16  std::string ballSubTopic;
17  std::string ballPubTopic;
18  int queueSize;
19 
20  _pnh.param<std::string>("dectection_topic", detectionTopic, "tag_detections");
21  _pnh.param<std::string>("origin_id", _originId, "0");
22  _pnh.getParam("pub_topic", pubTopic);
23  _pnh.getParam("pub_topics", pubTopics);
24  _pnh.param<std::string>("ball_sub_topic", ballSubTopic, "ball_vector");
25  _pnh.param<std::string>("ball_pub_topic", ballPubTopic, "ball_pos");
26  _pnh.param<double>("ball_radius", _ballRadius, 0.05);
27  _pnh.param<int>("buffer_size", _bufferSize, 10);
28  _pnh.param<int>("queue_size", queueSize, 100);
29 
30  _sub = _nh.subscribe(detectionTopic, queueSize, &Localizer::apriltagCallback, this);
31  _pub = _nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped>(pubTopic, queueSize);
32  _ballSub = _nh.subscribe(ballSubTopic, queueSize, &Localizer::ballCallback, this);
33  _ballPub = _nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped>(ballPubTopic, queueSize);
34  for (auto& kv : pubTopics)
35  _pubs[kv.first] =
36  _nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped>(kv.second, queueSize);
37 
38  _bufferPos = 0;
39  _buffer.reserve(_bufferSize);
40 }
41 
42 std::string Localizer::idsToString(std::vector<int> ids) {
43  if (ids.size() == 0)
44  return "";
45 
46  std::sort(ids.begin(), ids.end());
47  std::ostringstream oss;
48  oss << ids.front();
49  for (auto it = ids.begin() + 1; it != ids.end(); ++it)
50  oss << ',' << *it;
51  return oss.str();
52 }
53 
54 void Localizer::apriltagCallback(apriltag_ros::AprilTagDetectionArrayConstPtr msg) {
55  // Collect transforms and current camera transform
56  std::map<std::string, Eigen::Matrix4d> transforms;
57  for (auto& detection : msg->detections) {
58  std::string idStr = idsToString(detection.id);
59  geometry_msgs::Quaternion rot = detection.pose.pose.pose.orientation;
60  geometry_msgs::Point pos = detection.pose.pose.pose.position;
61  Eigen::Quaterniond quat(rot.w, rot.x, rot.y, rot.z);
62  Eigen::Matrix3d mat = quat.toRotationMatrix();
63  Eigen::Vector3d vec(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
64 
65  if (idStr == _originId) {
66  if (_buffer.size() == _bufferPos)
67  _buffer.emplace_back();
68  _buffer[_bufferPos] = std::make_pair(mat, vec);
69  _bufferPos = (_bufferPos + 1) % _bufferSize;
70  }
71  if (_pubs.find(idStr) != _pubs.end()) {
72  transforms[idStr] = combineMatrices(mat, vec);
73  }
74  }
75 
76  if (_buffer.size() == 0)
77  return;
78 
79  // Naively average positions/rotations
80  Eigen::Matrix3d avgRot = Eigen::Matrix3d::Zero();
81  Eigen::Vector3d avgPos = Eigen::Vector3d::Zero();
82  for (auto& item : _buffer) {
83  avgRot += item.first;
84  avgPos += item.second;
85  }
86  avgRot /= _buffer.size();
87  avgPos /= _buffer.size();
88  avgPos *= -1;
89 
90  // Kabsch algorithm
91  Eigen::JacobiSVD<Eigen::MatrixXd> svd(avgRot, Eigen::ComputeThinU | Eigen::ComputeThinV);
92  Eigen::Matrix3d ensureRHS = Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity();
93  ensureRHS(2, 2) = ((svd.matrixV() * svd.matrixU().transpose()).determinant() > 0) ? 1.0 : -1.0;
94  Eigen::Matrix3d camRotate = svd.matrixV() * ensureRHS * svd.matrixU().transpose();
95  _transform = combineMatrices(camRotate, Eigen::Vector3d::Zero()) *
96  combineMatrices(Eigen::Matrix3d::Identity(), avgPos);
97  _pub.publish(toMsg(_transform, msg->header.stamp));
98 
99  // re-publish detections
100  for (auto& kv : transforms) {
101  auto& id = kv.first;
102  auto& tagTransform = kv.second;
103  _pubs[id].publish(toMsg(_transform * tagTransform, msg->header.stamp));
104  }
105 }
106 
107 void Localizer::ballCallback(geometry_msgs::Vector3StampedConstPtr msg) {
108  Eigen::Vector4d camPos = _transform.col(3);
109  if (camPos.z() == 0)
110  return;
111 
112  // saves the confidence of the ball position's validity
113  double confidence = msg->vector.z;
114 
115  // set tge z to 1 to restore the vector's properties
116  Eigen::Vector4d camVec(msg->vector.x, msg->vector.y, 1, 0);
117  Eigen::Vector4d vec = _transform * camVec;
118  double t = (_ballRadius - camPos.z()) / vec.z();
119  Eigen::Vector4d pos = camPos + t * vec;
120 
121  pos.z() = confidence;
122  /* set the z of the new pose to the confidence of the ball position's validity */
123 
124  Eigen::Matrix4d pose = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
125  pose.col(3) << pos;
126  _ballPub.publish(toMsg(pose, msg->header.stamp));
127 }
128 
129 Eigen::Matrix4d Localizer::combineMatrices(const Eigen::Matrix3d& rot, const Eigen::Vector3d& pos) {
130  Eigen::Matrix4d transform = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
131  transform.topLeftCorner<3, 3>() << rot;
132  transform.col(3).head<3>() << pos;
133  return transform;
134 }
135 
136 geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped Localizer::toMsg(const Eigen::Matrix4d& transform,
137  ros::Time stamp,
138  const std::string& frameId) {
139  Eigen::Quaterniond rot(transform.topLeftCorner<3, 3>());
140  Eigen::Vector3d pos(transform.col(3).head<3>());
141 
142  geometry_msgs::PoseWithCovarianceStamped poseMsg;
143  poseMsg.header.stamp = stamp;
144  poseMsg.header.frame_id = frameId;
145  poseMsg.pose.pose.position.x = pos.x();
146  poseMsg.pose.pose.position.y = pos.y();
147  poseMsg.pose.pose.position.z = pos.z();
148  poseMsg.pose.pose.orientation.w = rot.w();
149  poseMsg.pose.pose.orientation.x = rot.x();
150  poseMsg.pose.pose.orientation.y = rot.y();
151  poseMsg.pose.pose.orientation.z = rot.z();
152 
153  return poseMsg;
154 }
